search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for folk (folk.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The exact URL for the official pricing page of Folk is: [https://help.folk.app/en/articles/7442361-pricing-plans](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/7442361-pricing-plans)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.error: Exception: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='r.jina.ai', port=443): Read timed out. (read timeout=5)

extracted_content.content:
When you sign up to folk for the first time, we immediately activate a **2-week free trial** on your workspace with the Premium features. This way you can fully test folk before making your decision.

Once your trial has ended, you'll need to upgrade to your preferred plan if you want to keep using folk. Otherwise, your account is blocked.

We offer the three following plans:

**1\. Standard plan**
---------------------

The standard package includes:

Price per seat (calculated based on the number of members in your workspace):

**2\. Premium plan**
--------------------

The premium package includes:

**Advanced features:**

Price per seat (calculated based on the number of members in your workspace):

3\. Custom plan
---------------

The Custom plan lets you personalize your package with the limits that will fit your needs.

If you're interested, please feel free to contact us through [this email](mailto:folks@folk.app) to let us know how many messages, enrichments, or magic fields you need. We'll then get back to you with a quote 😊

* * *

Related Articles

[Data Enrichment](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/6804416-data-enrichment)[Import contacts from Outlook](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/7229210-import-contacts-from-outlook)[Magic Fields: AI powered-fields](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/7325564-magic-fields-ai-powered-fields)[What are folk hard limits?](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/8632488-what-are-folk-hard-limits)[Start your free trial](https://help.folk.app/en/articles/9717880-start-your-free-trial)

We have variety of plans to fit your needs

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is calculated per seat for Standard and Premium plans. Custom plan requires contacting for a quote.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: The standard package includes basic features.
The premium package includes advanced features.
Custom plan lets you personalize your package with the limits that will fit your needs.
